com.snapon.sbs.dns.emailsettings

Class EmailBlacklist

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snapon.sbs.dns.emailsettings.EmailBlacklist

  • public class EmailBlacklist
extends Object
    This class represents the email blacklist table. The table will contain the email addresses that are not to be emailed anymore, the type of email (marketing, reminders etc), the date the email address was added to the table, the date the email address was removed from the table and the schema the request came from.

    • Constructor Summary
